靈.definition: quick; alert; efficacious; effective; to come true; spirit; departed soul; coffin

靈丘.definition: Lingqiu county in Datong 大同[Da4 tong2], Shanxi

靈丘縣.definition: Lingqiu county in Datong 大同[Da4 tong2], Shanxi

靈丹妙藥.definition: effective cure, miracle medicine (idiom); fig. wonder-cure for all problems; panacea; elixir

靈便.definition: quick; agile; nimble; easy to handle; handy

靈光.definition: divine light (around the Buddha); a halo; a miraculous column of light; (slang) jolly good!

靈台.definition: Lingtai county in Pingliang 平涼|平凉[Ping2 liang2], Gansu

靈台縣.definition: Lingtai county in Pingliang 平涼|平凉[Ping2 liang2], Gansu

靈命.definition: the will of Heaven; the will of God

靈壽.definition: Lingshou county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei

靈壽縣.definition: Lingshou county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei

靈寶.definition: see 靈寶市|灵宝市[Ling2bao3 Shi4]

靈寶市.definition: Lingbao, county-level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽市|三门峡市[San1men2xia2 Shi4], Henan

靈川.definition: Lingchuan county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

靈川縣.definition: Lingchuan county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

靈床.definition: bier; bed kept as it was when the deceased was alive

靈性.definition: spiritual nature; spirituality; intelligence (esp. in animals)

靈感.definition: inspiration; insight; a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor

靈敏.definition: smart; clever; sensitive; keen; quick; sharp

靈棺.definition: a bier; a catafalque (memorial platform); a coffin

靈樞經.definition: Lingshu Jing (Divine Pivot, or Spiritual Pivot), ancient Chinese medical text (c. 1st century BC)

靈機.definition: sudden inspiration; bright idea; clever trick

靈機一動.definition: a bright idea suddenly occurs (idiom); to hit upon an inspiration; to be struck by a brainwave

靈武.definition: see 靈武市|灵武市[Ling2wu3 Shi4]

靈武市.definition: Lingwu, county-level city in Yinchuan 銀川市|银川市[Yin2chuan1 Shi4], Ningxia

靈氣.definition: spiritual influence (of mountains etc); cleverness; ingeniousness

靈渠.definition: Lingqu, canal in Xing'an county 興安|兴安[Xing1 an1], Guangxi, built in 214 BC to link the Yangtze 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1] to the Pearl River 珠江[Zhu1 jiang1]

靈犀.definition: rhinoceros horn, reputed to confer telepathic powers; fig. mutual sensitivity; tacit exchange of romantic feelings; a meeting of minds

靈犀一點通.definition: mental rapport; likeness of mind; spiritual link

靈璧.definition: Lingbi, a county in Suzhou 宿州[Su4zhou1], Anhui

靈璧縣.definition: Lingbi, a county in Suzhou 宿州[Su4zhou1], Anhui

靈石.definition: Lingshi county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

靈石縣.definition: Lingshi county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

靈藥.definition: legendary magic potion of immortals; panacea; fig. wonder solution to a problem

靈貓.definition: civet (arboreal cat); viverrid (mammal group including mongoose and civet)

靈貓類.definition: a civet (arboreal cat); viverrid (mammal group including mongoose and civet)

靈醒.definition: (of senses, mind etc) alert; keen; clear-minded

靈雀寺.definition: Nyitso Monastery in Dawu County 道孚縣|道孚县[Dao4 fu2 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan

靈驗.definition: efficacious; effective; (of a prediction) accurate; correct

靈魂人物.definition: key figure; the linchpin of sth

靈魂深處.definition: in the depth of one's soul
